title: Update Account and Service Address
description: A customer is moving and needs to update their billing and service address for their home internet.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity using security questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Check if the requested new service address is within the company's coverage area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new address is serviceable.

tasks.description: Update the billing and service addresses on the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the addresses in the system.

tasks.description: Schedule a service transfer appointment for the move-in date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules a technician visit for the new address.
